This is a test run on bias5:

```{r}
setup_data <- prepare_badirate(og_path="one_by_one_rd/", tree ="SpeciesTree_chrono.txt", branch_models=c("gr" = "GR","fr" = "FR","ar" = "22->10:10->9:10->6:9->7:9->8:6->5:6->4:4->2:4->3_22->21:21->20:21->13:13->11:13->12:20->19:19->15:19->18:18->16:18->17","db" = "19->15","vb" = "18->16","ab" = "18->17","av" = "19->18:18->16:18->17"), out_dir = "bd_models_rd/",replicates=15, create_scripts=FALSE)

best_models <- bd_model_select(setup_data, "results")

gains <- bd_extract_gain(best_models)

gains %>% 
  filter(gains != losses) %>% 
  mutate(change_up = if_else(gains > losses, 1, 0), change_down = if_else(losses > gains, 1, 0)) %>% group_by(branch_code) %>% summarise(expanded = n() - sum(change_up), collapsed = n() - sum(change_down))

```
